name: ZPower
overview:
ZPower offers a battery that delivers high performance while safely powering portable devices. The batteryâ€™s aqueous technology also creates an earth-friendly, recyclable product that reduces environmental impact.

ZPower silver-zinc batteries have an intrinsically safe water-based chemistry that contains no lithium or flammable solvents. Unlike lithium-ion and lithium-polymer batteries, ZPower batteries are free from the problems of thermal runaway, fire, and danger of explosion. ZPower batteries are also free from the regulations that limit the size of lithium-containing batteries on airplanes. ZPower, Inc. holds 16 patents on rechargeable silver-zinc battery technology.

via: ZPower
